title: The Empress Diamond Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: Natural Emeralds (Round Cut). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases intricate floral motifs encrusted with dazzling diamonds. Central pendants are emphasized by the brilliant pop of Emeralds. The design features graceful teardrop-shaped diamond hangings, and the craftsmanship reflects traditional Telugu artistry with modern refinement. Delicate gold bead accents complete the look.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other significant celebrations. A stunning statement piece for bridal wear
it also makes a lasting impression at upscale parties and events.
description: This is a timeless investment. A statement piece that is not just jewelry, but a heirloom passed down through generations. The brilliant Diamonds are chosen for their superior cut, clarity and carat weight. The Emeralds add an auspicious touch, symbolizing prosperity and new beginnings. The necklace features traditional design with contemporary styling. The diamonds are strategically placed in a pave setting to provide maximum brilliance. Crafted by our artisans, this piece reflects the rich cultural heritage of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.
